subject: Simsonn Pro Pedals PROBLEM HELP
description_text:
Hi,
I accidentaly clicked a flash button in pedals v4 software, because it was
in chinese language, not in english... i need a .bin file I think. I have a
competition in a few days and i need properly working pedals... Please help
me...
Thanks a lot,
Damian

conversations.body_text: Hi Czerosek,  After reconnecting the USB, is it still not working? For V4 pedals, you can upgrade to SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. If you see a message saying “firmware too old,” go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Pedals → firmware → pedals-plus.sfu to complete the update.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
